availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Phillip T. Robertson (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of John Robertson and Nancy Robertson. Married to Kesiah Frances "Fanny" Shleton Robertson in Trigg County, Kentucky, on April 18, 1857. Father of Samuel Robertson, Joseph Robertson, John W. Robertson, and Phillip T. Robertson, Jr. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 306A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 10.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Harmony, p. 455B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 184.
"Phillip T Robertson (1830-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial #52147520, accessed April 15, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/52147520.
